function redraw_elo_plot() { var base_url = 'players_elo_graph.php?lang=nl&player_id=38748&from=#START_SEASON#&to=10&show=#ELO_LIST#&show_coef=#SHOW_COEF#'; var graph = document.getElementById('elo_graph'); var season = document.getElementById('start_graph'); var show_coef = document.getElementById('show_coef'); var elo_list = ''; var i; for (i=7; i<=10; i++) { var show_elo = document.getElementById('show_elo'+i); if (show_elo && show_elo.checked) { elo_list += (elo_list==''?'':',') + i; } } if (elo_list == '') { elo_list = '7'; } base_url = base_url.replace(/(#START_SEASON#)/, season ? season.value : '10'); base_url = base_url.replace(/(#SHOW_COEF#)/, show_coef && show_coef.checked ? '1' : '0'); graph.src = base_url.replace(/(#ELO_LIST#)/, elo_list); } function toggle_show_points_in_table() { var show_points_in_table = document.getElementById('show_points_in_table'); location.href = '/?lang=nl&menu=6&result=1&sel=38748&category=1&show_elo_in_table=' + show_points_in_table.value; } Evolutie ELO punten
